mapper.select: SELECT a.mobl_no --테블릿 관리번호 , a.spot_equip_no --작업장별설비유형관리번호 , a.device_ip --장치IP , a.device_port --장치PORT , a.device_no --장치번호 , a.protocol --통신프로토콜코드 , a.fr_addr --Reading 시작주소 (ByTCP인 경우만 해당됨) , a.data_len --수신데이터길이(ByTCP인 경우만 해당됨) , a.sys_menu_no --연동메뉴번호 , a.disp_yn --표기여부 , b.spot_no --설치장소번호 , b.equip_no --감지장치번호 , c.spot_nm --설치작업장명 , d.equip_nm --설비유혐명 , e.code_nm AS protocol_nm --통신프로토콜명 , f.sys_menu_nm --연관메뉴명 FROM mobile_info a JOIN spot_equip b ON a.spot_equip_no = b.spot_equip_no JOIN spot_info C ON b.spot_no = c.spot_no AND c.cust_no = #{custNo} JOIN equip_info d ON b.equip_no = d.equip_no LEFT JOIN code_info e ON a.protocol = e.code_no LEFT JOIN sys_menu f ON a.sys_menu_no = f.sys_menu_no WHERE a.used_yn = 'Y' and c.spot_no = #{spotNo} and b.equip_no = #{equipNo} order by spot_nm limit #{pageSz} offset #{pageNo}

SELECT a.mobl_no --테블릿 관리번호 ,a.spot_equip_no --작업장별설비유형관리번호 ,a.device_ip --장치IP ,a.device_port --장치PORT ,a.device_no --장치번호 ,a.protocol --통신프로토콜코드 ,a.fr_addr --Reading 시작주소 (ByTCP인 경우만 해당됨) ,a.sys_menu_no --연동메뉴번호 ,a.disp_yn --표기여부 ,c.spot_nm --설치작업장명 ,d.equip_nm --설비유혐명 ,e.code_nm AS protocol_nm --통신프로토콜명 FROM mobile_info a JOIN spot_equip b ON a.spot_equip_no = b.spot_equip_no JOIN spot_info C ON b.spot_no = c.spot_no AND c.cust_no = #{custNo} JOIN equip_info d ON b.equip_no = d.equip_no LEFT JOIN code_info e ON a.protocol = e.code_no where a.mobl_no = #{moblNo}
select 0 as seq , 0 as value , '작업장선택' as text union select 1 , spot_no , spot_nm from spot_info where cust_no = #{custNo} and used_yn = 'Y' and svc_tp = 'DIRECT_RECV' order by seq, text
select 0 as seq , 0 as value , '김지유형선택' as text union select 1 as seq , equip_no , equip_nm from equip_info where used_yn = 'Y' order by seq, text
select 0 as ord , 0 as value , '메뉴선택' as text union select 1 , sys_menu_no , sys_menu_nm from sys_menu where mobl_yn = 'Y' and used_yn ='Y' order by ord, value

SELECT a.mobl_no --테블릿 관리번호 ,a.spot_equip_no --작업장별설비유형관리번호 ,a.device_ip --장치IP ,a.device_port --장치PORT ,a.device_no --장치번호 ,a.protocol --통신프로토콜코드 ,e.code_nm AS protocol_nm --통신프로토콜명 ,a.fr_addr --Reading 시작주소 (ByTCP인 경우만 해당됨) ,a.data_len --유효 Data 길이 (ByTCP인 경우만 해당됨) ,a.sys_menu_no --연동메뉴번호 ,a.disp_yn --표기여부 ,coalesce (b.max_nor_val ,0) as max_nor_val --최대정상인정값 ,coalesce (b.min_nor_val ,0) as min_nor_val --최소정상인정값 ,coalesce (b.max_lmt_val ,0) as max_lmt_val --최대허용측정값 ,coalesce (b.min_lmt_val ,0) as min_lmt_val --최소허용측정값 ,b.meas_unit --측정단위 ,c.spot_nm --설치작업장명 ,d.equip_no --장치관리번호 ,d.equip_nm --장치유혐명 FROM mobile_info a JOIN spot_equip b ON a.spot_equip_no = b.spot_equip_no JOIN spot_info C ON b.spot_no = c.spot_no AND c.cust_no = #{custNo} JOIN equip_info d ON b.equip_no = d.equip_no join code_info f on b.meas_unit = f.code_no LEFT JOIN code_info e ON a.protocol = e.code_no where a.used_yn = 'Y' and a.sys_menu_no = #{sysMenuNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM oper_mast WHERE oper_no NOT IN (SELECT MAX(oper_no) FROM oper_mast where spot_equip_no = #{spotEquipNo})
mapper.select:
select a.prod_no --품번 , a.prod_nm --품명 , coalesce (a.mess,1) as mess --단품중량 , coalesce (a.qty_per_pkg,1) as qty_per_pkg --세트수량 , a.sz --규격 , b.code_nm as sale_unit_nm --판매단위명 , #{baseUrl} ||'prod/' || a.prod_no::varchar || '.png' as bar_code_url , c.indc_no from prod_info a join code_info b on a.sale_unit = b.code_no left join make_indc c on a.prod_no = c.prod_no and c.par_indc_no = 0 and c.indc_sts = 2403 WHERE a.used_yn = 'Y'
and upper(a.prod_nm) like '%' || upper(#{findSz}) || '%'
and a.prod_nm like '%' || #{findSz} || '%'
AND case when a.prod_nm < 'ㄱ' then SUBSTRING(a.prod_nm, 1, 1) when ascii('ㄱ') <= ascii(a.prod_nm) and ascii(a.prod_nm) <= ascii('ㅎ') then prod_nm when a.prod_nm < '나' then 'ㄱ' when a.prod_nm < '다' then 'ㄴ' when a.prod_nm < '라' then 'ㄷ' when a.prod_nm < '마' then 'ㄹ' when a.prod_nm < '바' then 'ㅁ' when a.prod_nm < '사' then 'ㅂ' when a.prod_nm < '아' then 'ㅅ' when a.prod_nm < '자' then 'ㅇ' when a.prod_nm < '차' then 'ㅈ' when a.prod_nm < '카' then 'ㅊ' when a.prod_nm < '타' then 'ㅋ' when a.prod_nm < '파' then 'ㅌ' when a.prod_nm < '하' then 'ㅍ' else 'ㅎ' end = #{findSz}
order by c.indc_no, a.prod_nm

select a.spot_equip_no --점소별설비관리번호 , a.oper_no --작동관리번호 , c.spot_nm --설치장소 , e.equip_nm --설비유형명 , max(a.meas_val) as meas_val --측정값 , to_char(to_timestamp(d.fr_unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as date_fr , to_char(to_timestamp(unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as chk_dt , to_char(to_timestamp(d.to_unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as date_to from equip_mngr_hstr a join spot_equip b on a.spot_equip_no = b.spot_equip_no join spot_info c on b.spot_no = c.spot_no and c.used_yn = 'Y' and c.spot_no = #{spotNo} join equip_info e on b.equip_no = e.equip_no join oper_mast d on a.oper_no = d.oper_no where to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD') between #{dateFr} and #{dateTo} and to_char(to_timestamp(d.fr_unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') is not null group by a.spot_equip_no , a.oper_no , c.spot_nm , e.equip_nm , to_char(to_timestamp(d.fr_unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , to_char(to_timestamp(unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , to_char(to_timestamp(d.to_unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') order by chk_dt desc

select count(a.spot_equip_no) from ( select a.spot_equip_no from equip_mngr_hstr a join spot_equip b on a.spot_equip_no = b.spot_equip_no join spot_info c on b.spot_no = c.spot_no and c.used_yn = 'Y' and c.spot_no = #{spotNo} join equip_info e on b.equip_no = e.equip_no join oper_mast d on a.oper_no = d.oper_no where to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD') between #{dateFr} and #{dateTo} and to_char(to_timestamp(d.fr_unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') is not null group by a.spot_equip_no , a.oper_no , c.spot_nm , e.equip_nm , to_char(to_timestamp(d.fr_unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , to_char(to_timestamp(unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , to_char(to_timestamp(d.to_unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') ) a

select a.spot_equip_no --점소별설비관리번호 , c.spot_nm --설치장소 , e.equip_nm --설비유형명 , max(round(a.meas_val::numeric,1)) as meas_val --측정값 , to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as chk_dt from equip_mngr_hstr a join spot_equip b on a.spot_equip_no = b.spot_equip_no and b.spot_equip_no = #{spotEquipNo} join spot_info c on b.spot_no = c.spot_no and c.used_yn = 'Y' join equip_info e on b.equip_no = e.equip_no where 1 = 1 and to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(now(),'YYYY-MM-DD')
and a.mngr_hstr_no = (select max(mngr_hstr_no) from equip_mngr_hstr where spot_equip_no = #{spotEquipNo})
group by a.spot_equip_no , a.oper_no , c.spot_nm , e.equip_nm , to_char(to_timestamp(unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') order by chk_dt desc

select count(a.spot_equip_no) from ( select a.spot_equip_no --점소별설비관리번호 , a.oper_no --작동관리번호 , c.spot_nm --설치장소 , e.equip_nm --설비유형명 , max(round(a.meas_val::numeric,1)) as meas_val --측정값 , to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as chk_dt from equip_mngr_hstr a join spot_equip b on a.spot_equip_no = b.spot_equip_no and b.spot_equip_no = #{spotEquipNo} join spot_info c on b.spot_no = c.spot_no and c.used_yn = 'Y' join equip_info e on b.equip_no = e.equip_no where 1 = 1 and to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(now(),'YYYY-MM-DD')
and a.mngr_hstr_no = (select max(mngr_hstr_no) from equip_mngr_hstr where spot_equip_no = #{spotEquipNo})
group by a.spot_equip_no , a.oper_no , c.spot_nm , e.equip_nm , to_char(to_timestamp(unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') ) a
select oper_no , meas_val , unix_hms , spot_equip_no from equip_mngr_hstr where oper_no = #{operNo} and mngr_hstr_no = ( select max(mngr_hstr_no) from equip_mngr_hstr where oper_no = #{operNo} )
mapper.update: update oper_mast set fr_qty = #{frQty}::numeric , to_qty = #{toQty}::numeric , weight_qty = #{weightQty}::numeric , metal_qty = #{metalQty}::numeric , pass_qty = #{passQty}::numeric , adj_qty = #{adjQty}::numeric , to_unix_hms = #{toUnixHms} where oper_no = #{operNo}
